Assumption: 8 hours allocated to R-22 for DEL-01-01 are sufficient for full compliance matrix production
ImpactIfWrong: If hours insufficient the estimate understates cost

Assumption: $105/hr rate for R-22 (Proposal Coordinator/Writer) is representative
ImpactIfWrong: If actual rate differs the line item amount changes proportionally

Assumption: No other roles contribute billable hours to DEL-01-01
Source: Level_of_Effort.csv has exactly one row for DEL-01-01
ImpactIfWrong: If a reviewer spends time not captured in LoE the estimate understates cost

Assumption: Estimated total project value is $12M CAD
ImpactIfWrong: HIGH -- every $1M change shifts bond premiums ~$25k and CCIP ~$20k

Assumption: Performance bond premium rate is 1.50% of contract price
Labour and Materials bond premium rate is 1.00%
CCIP insurance premium rate is 2.00%
Surety broker fee is $3500 (recommended midpoint)
Level of effort for DEL-01-03 is 10 hours (4 PM + 4 Legal + 2 Admin)
ImpactIfWrong: LOW -- even doubling hours adds only ~$2060

Assumption: Bond premiums calculated on total project value ($12M) not just base construction ($8.7M)
Source: Brief Special Instructions / RFP C-08 Contract Price
ImpactIfWrong: HIGH -- using $8.7M would reduce bond premiums by ~$82500 and CCIP by ~$66000

Assumption: Main PSB building footprint is 18000 sf
Cold storage building is 6000 sf (60x100 ft)
Developed site area is 4.5 acres
Apparatus/shop bays ~12000 sf (67%) and office ~6000 sf (33%)
Screw pile foundation system (80 piles at 6m centres)
ImpactIfWrong: Spread footings ~$100k less; deep foundations could add $100-200k

Assumption: 8 overhead doors at 16x16 ft (4 fire + 4 PW)
Fire protection (wet sprinkler) is required
Radiant in-floor heating in all apparatus/shop bays
40 parking stalls for light vehicles
200 lm each for on-site utilities
Perimeter wall area ~1520 m2 (160m x 9.5m avg)
Design fees at ~8-9% of construction value including markup
Schedule B mirrors DEL-01-04 pricing exactly
Source: Schedule B is a breakdown of Schedule A
ImpactIfWrong: If additional items emerge totals would change
LinkedLines: All B-* and C-* lines in DEL-01-05
